name: Aria The Time Adventure
description:
Hi,

Aria The Time Adventure is an adventure game with time-puzzle mechanics. You can stop or rewind time, on specific objects or on whole world. 

Aria stuck in realm between life & death and becouse of that greek God of death Thanatos and his brothers whant to posses this girl soul. Aria needs to get out before she drowns in real world. 

This is just a demo - showcase of current stage of the development.
